channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Fear and anger spread after another immigration shooting in Minneapolis
item.description: A federal officer has shot a man in the leg in Minneapolis after being attacked with a shovel and broom handle.

item.title: Liberian man arrested in Minneapolis raid was regularly checking in with authorities, lawyer says
Democrats propose state laws to limit ICE after Minneapolis shooting of Renee Good
